title: Bayesian Statistics: The three cultures
dot:
digraph BayesianStatistics{graph[rankdir=TB]; Subjective[label="Subjective Bayes
- Assumes data generating distribution
- Encodes prior beliefs
- Focus on posterior inference", shape=box];Objective[label="Objective Bayes
- Focus on hypothesis testing
- Uses least informative priors
- Inference depends on model and data", shape=box];Pragmatic[label="Pragmatic Bayes
- Emphasizes iterative design
- Involves full probability model
- Evaluates model fit and implications", shape=box]; MainIdea[label="Bayesian Statistics: The Three Cultures", shape=ellipse, fontsize=16]; MainIdea->Subjective;MainIdea->Objective;MainIdea->Pragmatic; Note1[label="Philosophical Underpinnings:
- Subjectivity vs. Objectivity
- Knowledge vs. Belief", shape=note];Note2[label="Applications:
- Decision Analysis
- Causal Inference
- Statistical Modeling", shape=note]; Subjective->Note1;Objective->Note1;Pragmatic->Note2;}
